{{Infobox dungeon |name = Meteor Falls |image = [[File:Meteor Falls.png]] |caption = A map of Meteor Falls |tokens = 18,000 |location = North of Route 115. }} '''Meteor Falls''' is a dungeon in [[Hoenn]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 243,000 |- | Boss || 740,000 |}
===Pokémon===
* Zubat * Golbat * Goldeen * Magikarp * Barboach * Solrock (boss) * Lunatone (boss)
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | [[Lucky Egg]] || 50% |}
